categories: Category:Imperial Army officers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: A captain served in the army of the Galactic Empire during the Galactic Civil War. In 3 ABY, the captain took part in the assault on the Rebel Alliance's 61st Mobile Infantry at the Inyusu Tor mountain on the manufacturing planet Sullust. During the battle, the captain was fatally shot in the head by the rebel soldier Brand, who fled her emplacement before the captain's comrades returned fire.

As the captain's head burned from the particle bolt, Brand tried to imagine what crimes the Imperial Army officer might have committed, such as slave-trading, spice possession, assault and corruption. The Imperial Army captain had blue eyes, black hair and features which gave the impression of a soft individual to Brand.
The Imperial Army captain appeared in the 2015 novel Battlefront: Twilight Company, written by Alexander Freed.
